multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the relationship between the number of parameters in a deep learning model and its generalization error?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: Generalization error is proportional to the number of parameters.
Generalization error is inversely proportional to the number of parameters.
Generalization error is independent of the number of parameters.
The relationship between generalization error and the number of parameters is complex and depends on the specific model.
